In the School culture festival, Blood is spraying. School has been exploded,13 survivors are trapped in school. Strange radio pop out , force them to join a game of find out the initiator which said it is the only way to escape. Unsettle changing and the Past have surfaced. Humanity and survival, what will be "real"?
